ParameterFields.Name: Number in Group
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The number of Morths in this group. If you set this to 0 or higher than 21 it will just be a single Morth instead.

ParameterFields.Name: Pot Sight Range (Tens)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 10 is the range around the pot the Morths are in that they'll notice the player and break out of the pot.
